sentence.Network_en: The illustrious Cuvier did not perceive that a barnacle was a crustacean.

sentence.Network_en: Molt - inhibiting hormone ( MIH ) is a member of CHH ( crustacean hyperglycemic hormone ) family.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 甲壳类动物（Crustacean）是身体分节动物分类中的一个大类。在动物王国中，甲壳虫与昆虫和蜘蛛属于同一门类。

entry.tran: 甲壳纲动物(如螃蟹、龙虾和褐虾)
entry.def: A crustacean is an animal with a hard shell and several pairs of legs, which usually lives in water. Crabs, lobsters, and shrimps are crustaceans.

means.word_mean: 1. any mainly aquatic arthropod usually having a segmented body and chitinous exoskeleton
1. of or belonging to the class Crustacea

sentences.en: These crustaceans provide a valuable food source for some fish.
